question: The assets under management of National Pension System and Atal Pension Yojana has crossed which mark recently?
explanation:
The Pension Fund Regulator and Development Authority (PFRDA) has stated that the Assets under Management (AUM) of the National Pension System and Atal Pension Yojana have crossed the mark of Rs 5 lakh crore
As on 10th October 2020, the number of subscribers under the NPS and APY has crossed 3.76 crores and the AUM crossed Rs.5,05,424 crore.
